Tournament JSON-RPC

АПИ реализована в формате JSON-RPC. Спецификация описана тут.

/authentication

Аутентификация пользователя Готово

/authentication/getTokenByPassword post

post

Получение токена по логину и паролю Готово

post /authentication/getTokenByPassword

Получение токена по логину и паролю Готово

  • Request
  • Response

Body

Media type: application/json

Type: any

Example:

{
  "jsonrpc": "2.0",
  "method": "...",
  "params": {
    "body": {
      "login": "admin",
      "password": "123456"
    }
  }
}

HTTP status code 200

Body

Media type: application/json

Type: any

Example:

{
  "jsonrpc": "2.0",
  "result": {
    "body": {
      "authorization_token": "jwt eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsImtpZCI6IjAwMDRiY2ZmLWQ4YWMtNDliZi1lZDVmLTY4ZGI0NjM3NTgyNCJ9.eyJzdWJqZWN0Ijp7ImlkIjo1NTV9LCJhdWQiOltdLCJleHAiOjIyMzY5MTg1MDh9.WY92mr4Ejf8B0TcrFxsbKklBhvoHyC-F-JQxzI1sBvI",
      "refresh_token": "Vi050WzmB2y9gdE5Wd8egdFODPlJZrP8RQD77sbCQhtpDnFpDncmmOMYPWa1yKfI"
    }
  }
}

/userRegistration

Регистрация

/userRegistration/requestActivationCode post

post

Запросить код активации

post /userRegistration/requestActivationCode

Запросить код активации

Secured by userAuth

Отправляем токен пользователя в теле POST-запроса, в параметре "params.meta.Authorization"

  • Request
  • Response
  • Security

Body

Media type: application/json

Type: any

Example:

{
  "jsonrpc": "2.0",
  "method": "userRegistration.requestActivationCode",
  "params": {
    "meta": {
      "version": 1,
      "Language":"ru",
      "timestamp": "2021-05-26T15:59:16+0000"
    },
    "body": {
      "email": "admin@ex.com"
    }
  }
}

HTTP status code 200

Body

Media type: application/json

Type: any

Example:

{
  "jsonrpc": "2.0",
  "result": null
}

Secured by userAuth

HTTP status code 200

Body

Media type: application/json

Type: any

Example:

{
  "jsonrpc": "2.0",
  "error": {
    "code": 401,
    "message": "Unauthorized"
  },
  "id": null
}

/userRegistration/createAccount post

post

Создать аккаунт

post /userRegistration/createAccount

Создать аккаунт

Secured by userAuth

Отправляем токен пользователя в теле POST-запроса, в параметре "params.meta.Authorization"

  • Request
  • Response
  • Security

Body

Media type: application/json

Type: any

Example:

{
  "jsonrpc": "2.0",
  "method": "userRegistration.createAccount",
  "params": {
    "meta": {
      "version": 1,
      "Language":"ru"
    },
    "body": {
      "email": "admin@ex.com",
      "code": "465956",
      "password": "Wwqq1$",
      "passwordConfirm": "Wwqq1$"
    }
  }
}

HTTP status code 200

Body

Media type: application/json

Type: any

Example:

{
  "jsonrpc": "2.0",
  "result": null
}

Secured by userAuth

HTTP status code 200

Body

Media type: application/json

Type: any

Example:

{
  "jsonrpc": "2.0",
  "error": {
    "code": 401,
    "message": "Unauthorized"
  },
  "id": null
}

/moneyTransaction

История транзакций Готово

/moneyTransaction/all post

post

Получить коллекцию записей

post /moneyTransaction/all

Получить коллекцию записей

Secured by userAuth

Отправляем токен пользователя в теле POST-запроса, в параметре "params.meta.Authorization"

  • Request
  • Response
  • Security

Body

Media type: application/json

Type: any

Example:

{
  "jsonrpc": "2.0",
  "method": "...",
  "params": {
    "meta": {
      "version": 1,
      "Language":"ru",
      "timestamp": "2021-05-26T15:59:16+0000",
      "Authorization": "bearer XAgQTzcEFIK2PrvtwkMyvDFD6bUjgq33z3kycw9-3t-RY2Ru1NpAc3q5fr5NeRGC"
    },
    "body": {

    }
  }
}

HTTP status code 200

Body

Media type: application/json

Type: any

Example:

{
  "jsonrpc": "2.0",
  "result": {
    "body": [
      {
        "id": 1,
        "amount": "112",
        "currencyId": 1,
        "typeId": 200,
        "senderId": 1,
        "recipientId": 4,
        "data": "{}",
        "description": "",
        "statusId": 200,
        "donnedAt": "2021-08-05 18:08:01",
        "createdAt": "2021-08-05 18:08:01"
      },
      {
        "id": 2,
        "amount": "458",
        "currencyId": 1,
        "typeId": 200,
        "senderId": 1,
        "recipientId": 4,
        "data": "{}",
        "description": "",
        "statusId": 200,
        "donnedAt": "2021-08-05 18:08:01",
        "createdAt": "2021-08-05 18:08:01"
      }
    ],
    "meta": {
      "perPage": 20,
      "totalCount": 2,
      "page": 1,
      "timestamp": "2021-08-09T14:37:08+0000"
    }
  }
}

Secured by userAuth

HTTP status code 200

Body

Media type: application/json

Type: any

Example:

{
  "jsonrpc": "2.0",
  "error": {
    "code": 401,
    "message": "Unauthorized"
  },
  "id": null
}

post

Получить одну запись

post /moneyTransaction/oneById

Получить одну запись

Secured by userAuth

Отправляем токен пользователя в теле POST-запроса, в параметре "params.meta.Authorization"

  • Request
  • Response
  • Security

Body

Media type: application/json

Type: any

Example:

{
  "jsonrpc": "2.0",
  "method": "...",
  "params": {
    "meta": {
      "version": 1,
      "Language":"ru",
      "timestamp": "2021-05-26T15:59:16+0000",
      "Authorization": "bearer XAgQTzcEFIK2PrvtwkMyvDFD6bUjgq33z3kycw9-3t-RY2Ru1NpAc3q5fr5NeRGC"
    },
    "body": {
      "id": 1
    }
  }
}

HTTP status code 200

Body

Media type: application/json

Type: any

Example:

{
  "jsonrpc": "2.0",
  "result": {
    "body": {
      "id": 1,
      "amount": "112",
      "currencyId": 1,
      "typeId": 200,
      "senderId": 1,
      "recipientId": 4,
      "data": "{}",
      "description": "",
      "statusId": 200,
      "donnedAt": "2021-08-05 18:08:01",
      "createdAt": "2021-08-05 18:08:01"
    },
    "meta": {
      "timestamp": "2021-08-09T14:15:50+0000"
    }
  }
}

Перевод средств

/moneyTransfer/transfer post

post

Перевод средств

post /moneyTransfer/transfer

Перевод средств

Secured by userAuth

Отправляем токен пользователя в теле POST-запроса, в параметре "params.meta.Authorization"

  • Request
  • Response
  • Security

Body

Media type: application/json

Type: any

Example:

{
  "jsonrpc": "2.0",
  "method": "moneyTransfer.transfer",
  "params": {
    "meta": {
      "version": 1,
      "Language":"ru",
      "timestamp": "2021-05-26T15:59:16+0000",
      "Authorization": "bearer XAgQTzcEFIK2PrvtwkMyvDFD6bUjgq33z3kycw9-3t-RY2Ru1NpAc3q5fr5NeRGC"
    },
    "body": {
      "recipientId": 2,
      "amount": 12
    }
  }
}

HTTP status code 200

Body

Media type: application/json

Type: any

Example:

{
  "jsonrpc": "2.0",
  "result": {
    "body": {

    }
  }

post

post /moneyWallet/all

Получить коллекцию записей

Secured by userAuth

Отправляем токен пользователя в теле POST-запроса, в параметре "params.meta.Authorization"

  • Request
  • Response
  • Security

Body

Media type: application/json

Type: any

Example:

{
  "jsonrpc": "2.0",
  "method": "moneyWallet.all",
  "params": {
    "meta": {
      "version": 1,
      "Language":"ru",
      "timestamp": "2021-05-26T15:59:16+0000",
      "Authorization": "bearer XAgQTzcEFIK2PrvtwkMyvDFD6bUjgq33z3kycw9-3t-RY2Ru1NpAc3q5fr5NeRGC"
    },
    "body": {

    }
  }
}

HTTP status code 200

Body

Media type: application/json

Type: any

Example:

{
  "jsonrpc": "2.0",
  "result": {
    "body": [
      {
        "id": 1,
        "amount": "0",
        "identityId": 1,
        "currencyId": 1,
        "createdAt": "2021-08-05 18:06:17",
        "currency": {
          "id": 1,
          "countryId": 1894,
          "code": "398",
          "char": "KZT",
          "title": "Тенге",
          "description": ""
        }
      },
      {
        "id": 2,
        "amount": "0",
        "identityId": 1,
        "currencyId": 2,
        "createdAt": "2021-08-05 18:06:17",
        "currency": {
          "id": 2,
          "countryId": 1894,
          "code": "643",
          "char": "RUB",
          "title": "Российский рубль",
          "description": ""
        }
      },
      {
        "id": 3,
        "amount": "0",
        "identityId": 1,
        "currencyId": 3,
        "createdAt": "2021-08-05 18:06:17",
        "currency": {
          "id": 3,
          "countryId": 1894,
          "code": "USD",
          "char": "840",
          "title": "Доллар США",
          "description": ""
        }
      }
    ],
    "meta": {
      "perPage": 20,
      "totalCount": 3,
      "page": 1,
      "timestamp": "2021-08-09T15:42:25+0000"
    }
  }

/gameCategory/create post

post

Создать запись

post /gameCategory/create

Создать запись

Secured by userAuth

Отправляем токен пользователя в теле POST-запроса, в параметре "params.meta.Authorization"

  • Request
  • Response
  • Security

Body

Media type: application/json

Type: any

Example:

{
  "jsonrpc": "2.0",
  "method": "gamePartner.create",
  "params": {
    "meta": {
      "version": 1,
      "Language":"ru",
      "Authorization": "bearer >w,H*?JU[,j:kBb\"hmVR&0CpPfZ\/;Q>@JVG+Y|s\/_-\\gGz7&f&@ed6z3[w&71SuP"
    },
    "body": {
      "title": "Тестовый партнёр",
      "description": "Описание партнёра",
      "statusId": 1
    }
  }
}

HTTP status code 200

Body

Type: any
